definition: to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: It did my heart good to hear about your promotion to Vice President of the agency.
sentences.chinese: 得知你提升为经销处副总经理，我心里特别高兴。

sentences.english: Her husband, who sells used car parts, has seen his commissions drop.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫经销二手次车配件，他的薪酬也下降了。

sentences.english: Dube information related to a variety of products to support our co-operation dealers.
sentences.chinese: 杜贝相关的各类产品信息，以支持我们合作的经销商。

sentences.english: This is where a vending machine distributor can really help you.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个自动售货机经销商真能帮助你。

sentences.english: That fast food business have expanded through the sale of franchise .
sentences.chinese: 该快餐店通过出售联营经销权而扩大了生意。

sentences.english: This initially comprised 10 main distributors and 28 dealerships.
sentences.chinese: 这件起初由10个主要经销商和28经销商销售。

sentences.chinese: 这件起初由10个主要经销商和28经销商销售。

sentences.english: Exclusive distribution of "HIESTAND Swiss Gourmet Bakery" leader in frozen premium good.
sentences.chinese: 的独家经销商，优质冷冻产品的龙头企业。

sentences.english: A new car depreciates significantly the moment you drive it out the dealership.
sentences.chinese: 当你一把新车开出经销商处，它就折价了。

sentences.english: And who are these illegal gun dealers?
sentences.chinese: 谁是非法枪枝经销商呢？

sentences.english: Recruitment of overseas agents and distributors, detailed issues please contact us.
sentences.chinese: 诚招海外代理与经销商，详细事宜请联系我们。

sentences.english: You are welcome to be our distributor and make the dual win future of our enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 诚征区域经销商，共同创造企业双赢的未来。

sentences.english: Both of these wineries are imported and distributed exclusively by Summergate in China.
sentences.chinese: 这两款酒均由美夏公司在中国独家进口经销。

sentences.english: Major production and distribution piston rings and valve seat.
sentences.chinese: 主要生产和经销活塞环及气门座圈。

sentences.english: The company's overgrown dealer network will be pruned.
sentences.chinese: 该公司过剩的经销商网络将得到修剪。

sentences.english: We write to introduce ourselves as large dealers in foodstuffs with good connections in the country.
sentences.chinese: 现函告，我方为食品大经销商，在国内拥有大批客户。

definition: to sell as agent/to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies)/proxy sale (of stocks)
to specialize in (a particular product or service)/monopoly
